---
title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook
---

Here's a quick example of switching b/w R and Python: 

```{r}
library(reticulate)
library(Ecdat)
```

```{r}
# import the packages we need
sns <- import('seaborn')
plt <- import('matplotlib.pyplot')
pd <- import('pandas')
```



```{r}
# Convert to a Python object
housing_df <- r_to_py(Housing)
str(housing_df)
```



# https://towardsdatascience.com/python-seaborn-plots-in-r-using-reticulate-fb59cebf61a7  

```{python}
sns.pairplot(data = r.Housing)
```
